text: Show me the money!" - How to market Infection Prevention and Antimicrobial Stewardship to the C-suite? Bleasdale, MD, highlights the importance of communicating the needs of infection prevention programs to top-level executives. As the chief quality officer, assistant vice chancellor of quality and patient safety, and medical director of infection prevention and antimicrobial stewardship at UIH, she'll share her insights at SEA 2024.
